entities.name: romilda
entities.description: A bold-looking girl with large dark eyes, a prominent chin and long black hair. She is confident and loud.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Not described in detail but mentioned as the one who should join Romilda in her compartment.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A student whose bottom is sticking out from under a seat.

relationships.description: Romilda invites Harry to join her in her compartment.
Romilda teases Neville by pointing at his bottom sticking out from under the seat.
